summary: REQ-15 is fully implemented. The Android download button in Layout.tsx footer has been updated from placeholder '#android-download' to a valid Play Store URL ('https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.calmamente.app'). The button maintains existing styling (rounded-full, primary colors, hover effects, Smartphone icon) and footer layout including CEO attribution remains unchanged. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
